name: Exient 3D Model
summary: Learn about .XGM files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Most notably, the games Angry Birds Go! and Angry Birds Transformers use XGM files. In these games' installation directories, XGM files are typically found in a sub-directory named models.

description: An XGM file is a 3D model used in a video game developed using the Exient XGS Engine. It is used to show a character or object in-game. XGM files are not meant to be opened by players, but modders have created tools that allow them to import XGM files into 3D modeling programs.

instructions: You can use player-created scripts to import XGM files into Blender (multiplatform) or Noesis (Windows).
